verses.verse: When <S%H1732>David<s%> was a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5674>past<s%> the <S%H7218>top,<s%> <S%H6717>behold,<s%> Ziba the <S%H5288>servant<s%> of <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H7125>met<s%> <S%H6776>him,<s%> with a couple of <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> <S%H2280>saddled,<s%> and on them two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> clusters of <S%H6778>raisins,<s%> and one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> summer <S%H7019>fruits,<s%> and a <S%H5035>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6717>Ziba,<s%> What do you mean by <S%H6717>these?<s%> Ziba <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> are for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>household<s%> to ride <S%H7392>on;<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> and summer <S%H7019>fruit<s%> for the young <S%H5288>men<s%> to <S%H398>eat;<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> that such as are <S%H3287>faint<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Where is your <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son?<s%>" <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3389>"Behold,<s%> he is staying in Jerusalem; for he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> 'Today the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H7725>restore<s%> me the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of my <S%H1>father.<s%>'"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6717>Ziba,<s%> <S%H4648>"Behold,<s%> all that pertains to Mephibosheth is <S%H6717>yours.<s%>" Ziba <S%H559>said,<s%> "I do <S%H7812>obeisance.<s%> Let me <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

When <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H980>Bahurim,<s%> <S%H376>behold,<s%> a man of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> came <S%H3318>out,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1617>Gera.<s%> He came <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> still as he <S%H3318>came.<s%>

He <S%H5619>cast<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> at <S%H1732>David,<s%> and at all the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> and all the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> were on his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on his <S%H8040>left.<s%>
<S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> when he <S%H7043>cursed,<s%> "Be <S%H3318>gone,<s%> be <S%H3318>gone,<s%> you <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H376>fellow!<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7725>returned<s%> on you all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> in whose place you have <S%H4427>reigned!<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H53>Absalom<s%> your <S%H1121>son!<s%> <S%H7451>Behold,<s%> you are caught by your own mischief, because you are a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1818>blood!<s%>"

Then <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "Why should this <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king?<s%> Please let me go <S%H5674>over<s%> and take <S%H5493>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What have I to do with <S%H1121>you,<s%> you sons of <S%H6870>Zeruiah?<s%> Because he <S%H7043>curses,<s%> and because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7043>him,<s%> 'Curse <S%H1732>David;<s%>' who then shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H6213><s%> 'Why have you done so?'"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H52>Abishai,<s%> and to all his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H1121>"Behold,<s%> my son, who came <S%H3318>forth<s%> from my <S%H4578>bowels,<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> my <S%H5315>life.<s%> How much more this <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> <S%H3240>now?<s%> Leave him alone, and let him <S%H7043>curse;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has invited <S%H559>him.<s%>

It may be that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5869>wrong<s%> done to <S%H3068>me,<s%> and that Yahweh will <S%H7725>repay<s%> me <S%H2896>good<s%> for the <S%H7045>cursing<s%> of me <S%H3117>today.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> by the <S%H1870>way;<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> went <S%H1980>along<s%> on <S%H2022>the<s%> <S%H6763>hillside<s%> <S%H5980>opposite<s%> <S%H7043>him,<s%> and cursed as he <S%H1980>went,<s%> <S%H5619>threw<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H5980>at<s%> <S%H5619>him,<s%> and threw <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H935>him,<s%> came <S%H5889>weary;<s%> and he refreshed himself <S%H5314>there.<s%>
<S%H53>Absalom,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and Ahithophel with <S%H302>him.<s%>

It <S%H2365>happened,<s%> when Hushai the <S%H757>Archite,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H7463>friend,<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> that <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> "Long <S%H2421>live<s%> the <S%H4428>king!<s%> Long <S%H2421>live<s%> the <S%H4428>king!<s%>"
<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2365>Hushai,<s%> "Is this your <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to your <S%H7453>friend?<s%> Why <S%H1980>didn't<s%> you go with your <S%H7453>friend?<s%>"

<S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> <S%H3068>"No;<s%> but whomever Yahweh, and this <S%H5971>people,<s%> and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> his will I <S%H3427>be,<s%> and with him I will stay.

<S%H8145>Again,<s%> whom should I <S%H5647>serve?<s%> <S%H6440>Shouldn't<s%> I serve in the presence of his <S%H1121>son?<s%> As I have <S%H5647>served<s%> in your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6440>presence,<s%> so will I be in your <S%H6440>presence.<s%>"
Then <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H302>Ahithophel,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> your <S%H6098>counsel<s%> what we shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

<S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> "Go <S%H935>in<s%> to your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubines,<s%> that he has <S%H3240>left<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%> Then all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> that you are <S%H887>abhorred<s%> by your <S%H1>father.<s%> Then the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all who are with you will be <S%H2388>strong.<s%>"

So they <S%H5186>spread<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> on the top of the <S%H1406>house;<s%> and <S%H53>Absalom<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubines<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel,<s%> which he <S%H3289>gave<s%> in those <S%H3117>days,<s%> was as if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> at the <S%H1697>oracle<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> so was all the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> both with <S%H1732>David<s%> and with <S%H53>Absalom.<s%>
